text: Kya logon ke liye yeh ek ajeeb baat ho gayi hai ke humne khud unhi mein se ek aadmi ko ishara kiya ke (gaflat mein padey huey) logon ko chauka de aur jo maan lein unko khush khabri de de ke unke liye unke Rubb ke paas sachhi izzat o sarfarazi hai? (Kya yahi woh baat hai jispar) munkireen ne kaha ke yeh shaks to khula jaadugar hai
